remarks: Extended sum over a pair.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
esumpr.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k = A ) -> C = D ) $.
esumpr.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k = B ) -> C = E ) $.
esumpr.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
esumpr.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
esumpr.5 $e |- ( ph -> D e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esumpr.6 $e |- ( ph -> E e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esumpr.7 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
esumpr $p |- ( ph -> sum* k e. { A , B } C = ( D +e E ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d D k $.
$d E k $.
$d V k $.
$d W k $.
$d k ph $.
